title: Notes upon the Lord Bishop of Salisbury's four late discourses to the clergy of his diocess particularly upon the last, relating to the dissenters, in a letter to a friend.
author: Chorlton, John, 1666-1705.
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Attributed to John Chorlton. cf. BM.
